Commands.Ring Holy: 3-hit Holy BRV magic attackAttacks distributed based on number of enemiesDeals 2 hits to target when there are 2 enemiesSelf: Raises Soul Cleave level by 2Becomes Ring Holy+ while Soul Cleave IV is active
Commands.Ring Holy+: 3-hit Holy BRV magic attack.Attacks distributed based on number of enemies.Deals 2 hits to target when there are 2 enemies.Cancels Soul Cleave IV
Commands.Ultima (IX): Random 9-hit BRV magic attack + group HP attackHP damage sharedSelf: Raises Soul Cleave level by 2Becomes Ultima (IX)+ while Soul Cleave IV is active
Commands.Ultima (IX)+: Random 9-hit BRV magic attack + group HP attack followed by random 9-hit magic BRV attack + group HP attack.HP damage shared; low turn rate.Cancels Soul Cleave IV
Commands.Force Symphony: 5-HIT AoE BRV+HP attack.Moderately increases BRV damage to a single target.100% HP damage dealt to all targets.Grants 4 stacks of Soul Divider.Grants Dark Messenger for 5 turns.Soul Divider is not dispelled after using Ring Holy+ and Ultima (IX)+ while Dark Messenger is active.

Artifacts.Buffed Guard: Raises Defense Power by 10% while buffed.
Artifacts.Soul Conductor Boost: Increases the effects of Soul Conductor by 5%.
Artifacts.Mighty Ring Holy: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Ring Holy by 10%.
Artifacts.Mighty Ultima (IX): Raises BRV Damage dealt by Ultima (IX) by 10%.

Passives.Ring Holy Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Ring Holy.
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Break Bonus Up: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Ultima (IX) Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Ultima (IX).
Passives.BRV Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Ring Holy Charge: Increases the max uses of Ring Holy by 1.
Passives.Ultima (IX) Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after using Ultima (IX).
Passives.Soul Conductor: Slightly raises Max BRV and Speed while buffed.
